text:
Hello.

I set the Option

KeptBodySize 2048 (and a lot of other sizes)

But i get:

AH00526: Syntax error on line 9 of /etc/apache2/vhosts.d/02.conf:
KeptBodySize must be a valid size in bytes, or zero.

Even KeptBodySize 0 isn't accepted. 

How can i solve this? Am i doing something stupid?

best regards
t.
creator: t.stein@syseleven.de

text:
Thanks for the report, will propose fix for 2.4.2.

http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1304641&view=rev
